name: Data Doesn't Lie
description:
You study samples under your microscraper. You extract the data. Then -- and only then -- you sleep.

Written by Jim Munroe with illustrations by Luc Allenet de Ribemont, for the Nordic Game Jam 2017. Created with Texture.

http://nomediakings.org

http://humanhacks.tumblr.com

http://texturewriter.com
